mapper.select: SELECT e_t.text,e_x.type x_type,e_x.data x_data,e_y.type y_type,e_s.data s_data,e_s.type s_tpye FROM echarts e LEFT JOIN E_title e_t ON e.t_id = e_t.id LEFT JOIN e_xAxis e_x ON e.x_id = e_x.id LEFT JOIN E_yAxis e_y ON e.y_id = e_y.id LEFT JOIN e_series e_s ON e.s_id = e_s.id WHERE e.corp_id = #{corp_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND e.type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
